channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to Know About the Deadly D.C. Shooting of Israeli Embassy Aides
item.description: Two employees of the Israeli Embassy in Washington were killed. A suspect was charged with murder.

item.title: Trump Rebukes Putin, Calls Escalation of Attacks ‘Absolutely Crazy’
item.description: “He’s sending rockets into cities and killing people, and I don’t like it at all,” President Trump said of his Russian counterpart.

item.title: 'I cannot believe it': Alex Palou of Spain cruises to victory at the Indianapolis 500
item.description: The 28-year-old rocketed past Andretti Global's Marcus Ericsson in the final laps of the contest and held onto the top position until the end.

item.title: Israeli Airstrike Kills Doctor’s Children, Gaza Officials Say
item.description: Two more children were missing, and the doctor’s husband and one other child were injured in the strike on Friday, the officials said. Israel said it ...

item.title: The Israeli Connections to a New Gaza Aid Plan Promoted as Independent
item.description: Foreign contractors are set to carry out a contentious new food aid system in Gaza, displacing experienced aid agencies like the United Nations. It wa...

item.title: Trump again blasts Harvard over international students as judge blocks revocation

item.title: Inside Ukraine's last maternity ward in a region surrounded by Russian forces
item.description: NPR visits a hospital in eastern Ukraine's Donetsk region, in a town where many residents have fled but some young couples are holding on and hoping t...

item.title: A Quiet Funeral in Israel for Victim of Washington Shooting
item.description: Yaron Lischinsky, 30, was buried on Sunday in the small town where his family lived.

item.title: 'I am Roman,' Pope Leo says, as he becomes the bishop of Rome

item.title: 5 Years After George Floyd’s Murder, the Backlash Takes Hold

item.title: Mumbai's iconic pav bread might soon be toast

item.title: Venezuela Is Holding an Election for Essequibo, a Region of Neighboring Guyana
item.description: In Sunday’s election, President Nicolás Maduro has called to elect a governor of Essequibo — a region that actually belongs to neighboring Guyana.
